name: Artissano
tag_list: fashion, style, global, high-quality, leather, jewelry, womens, men, artisan, etsy, gilt, designers, design
overview:
Artissano is a curated marketplace showcasing the work of fashion designers from around the world. We strive to provide our customers uniquely designed, high quality, artisan fashion goods.

Through traveling different parts of the globe, the Artissano team has discovered and continues to unearth tremendous fashion design talent. We come across and converse with fashion designers that are truly passionate and connected to their products. Their emphasis on their design process and the quality of their products is self-evident. Interestingly, they come from all walks of life and may have been designing from three to twenty years.

At Artissano, our vision is to be the premier conduit for consumers to access designers from all parts of the globe. We strive to bring our customers products but also the stories of each designer. We find their stories to be truly interesting and inspirational—we hope you do too! In this way, we hope that our consumers will build a deeper connection to the products on our site; one that cannot be obtained in a shopping mall or large department store.
